Projects

Notify.gov

Designed and developed the Notify.gov platform, a secure government messaging service. Led branding, front-end development, and accessibility improvements, ensuring compliance with WCAG 2.2 and the U.S. Web Design System (USWDS). Built data visualizations with D3.js to enhance insights.

10x.gsa.gov - Redesign

Led the developement and assisted in the design of a reimagined 10x.gsa.gov, a platform for federal innovation funding, improving usability, accessibility, and information flow. Applied design thinking & agile methodologies to revamp the site while maintaining USWDS consistency and meeting WCAG 2.2 standards.
